The Velocity Obstacle algorithm - Collision avoidance for ASVs in compliance with COLREGs

This is a documentation for a collision avoidance algorithm for autonomous surface vehicle in compliance with the International Regulations for Preventing Collisions at Sea 1972 (COLREGs). It includes a brief introduction to the motivation of the work, the basics and a description of the algorithm used. It also includes instructions on how to install and use the algorithm, as well as the possibility to test the algorithm in the MARUSimulator. In the conclusion is also the implementation of the algorithm in python with detailed description of each function.
